targets.expr: ((sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{}[$__rate_interval])))) * 100) + on(instance) group_left(nodename) (0* node_uname_info{})
